donor_name: UNITED STATES AGENCY FOR INTERNATIONAL DEVELOPMENT (USAID)
outputs.output_descr: The project will work on developing the capacities of central and local governance for utilization of research and data for policy-making and accountability.  Specifically, perceptions of citizens on pertinent issues will be highlighted by biannual opinion polls and respective briefs and analysis; these will serve as the bases for dialogue with Kosovo Government line-ministries and institutions in order to develop capacities for an informed decision-making process.  The opinion polls, targeted polls and focus groups will provide first hand evidence on the perceptions and opinions of the public on the development issues facing Kosovo. The data from the research will serve for targeted analysis and for developing follow-up actions for addressing specific issues in cooperation with Kosovo authorities.   The project will work on the following output targets: six (6) biannual "Public Pulse" reports, three (3) Action Papers addressing important issues and three (3) Public Pulse Analysis prepared in cooperation with Kosovo institutions.

donor_name: UNITED STATES AGENCY FOR INTERNATIONAL DEVELOPMENT (USAID)
outputs.output_descr: Public Pulse Project is a continuation of KEWS and will continue the work on research and analysis of pertinent issues and serve as a watchdog initiative that will constructively engage the Government of Kosovo and Public Institutions. In cooperation with the Kosovo institutions it will also continue to develop and advocate for preventive measures to assure stability, through increased dialogue between governmental institutions and Kosovo citizens.

project_descr: The objective of the project is to increase the communication between public and democratic institutions regarding pertinent issues highlighted by biannual research.
